onSpanRemoved(android.text.Spannable,jav.Description: This method is called to notify you that the specified object has been detached from the specified range of the text.
onSpanRemoved(android.text.Spannable,jav.FullName: public abstract void onSpanRemoved (Spannable text, Object what, int start, int end)

onSpanAdded(android.text.Spannable,java..Description: This method is called to notify you that the specified object has been attached to the specified range of the text.
onSpanAdded(android.text.Spannable,java..FullName: public abstract void onSpanAdded (Spannable text, Object what, int start, int end)

onSpanChanged(android.text.Spannable,jav.Description: This method is called to notify you that the specified object has been relocated from the range ostart…oend to the new range nstart…nend of the text.
onSpanChanged(android.text.Spannable,jav.FullName: public abstract void onSpanChanged (Spannable text, Object what, int ostart, int oend, int nstart, int nend)

ClassDesc: When an object of this type is attached to a Spannable, its methods will be called to notify it that other markup objects have been added, changed, or removed.
